About Text:
MOTI as a brand made its inception in 1999, We are one of India's largest and growing manufacturers of 300 high-quality plastic household products.

Our manufacturing machines are specially chosen to give us the broadest custom plastic molding capability and have been customized and upgraded to meet our performance.

MOTI is ISO 9001:2015 certified, We maintain high-quality standards with rigorous testing which gives our customers reliability and satisfaction.
Skills: Marketing, Project Management, Manufacturing, Sales, Design
